markdown: '''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [side quest](/pillarsOfEternityIiDeadfireQuestsSideQuests/) in {{poe2}}. ## Synopsis The Defiant has run aground, and its crew is dead or scattered. A crew will be of use in maneuvering the ship. Perhaps there are survivors somewhere on the beach. There may be more survivors to be found. ## Walkthrough * The goal is to collect the remnants of your crew. There are several to be had: ** [Irrena](/irrena/) is up on the deck and needs [Survival](/survival/) 2 or [Lay on Hands](/layOnHandsDeadfire/) to heal her or [Athletics](/athletics/) 2 / [Might](/might/) 15 to help her down from the ship. If you have no Survival, Eder's party assist should help. ** [Chitupec](/chitupec/) is near the center of the beach if you elected to save him during the prologue and will point you towards Beodulf in the cave. ** [Eld Engrim](/eldEngrim/) is the easiest to get, as he's waiting just up the road. ** [Beodul](/beodul/) is located inside the cave, near the upper center, surrounded by a ton of bear traps. You can disable the traps ([Mechanics](/mechanics/) 1), guide him through ([Perception](/perception/) 11), call him a coward and make him pass through them ([Bluff](/bluff/) 2), or set the traps off with stones ([Intellect](/intellect/) 13 or [Sleight of Hand](/sleightOfHand/) 2). Alternatively, you can initiate combat with the enemy construct to the East, use it to activate one of the traps, and if Beodul survives combat, he will be freed. * Gathering them up completes the quest. ## Journal {| class="wikitable" ! colspan="3" style="word-break:break-all" | Quests/09_Port_Maje/09_QST_Crew_Members.quest |- ! width="40px" | {{tooltip|ID|Objectives: 0, Descriptions: 10000, Addenda: 20000, End states: 30000, Alternate descriptions: 40000}} ! colspan="2" | Objectives |- | rowspan="2" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''0''' | colspan="2" | '''Helping Hands''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10000 | The Defiant has run aground, and its crew is dead or scattered. There may be more survivors to be found. |- | rowspan="14" style="vertical-align:text-top; text-align:center" | '''1''' | colspan="2" | '''Search for members of your crew.''' |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 10001 | A crew will be of use in maneuvering the ship. Perhaps there are survivors somewhere on the beach. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20002 | One survivor was seen heading towards a nearby cave to the north. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20000 | I found Irrena on the deck of the Defiant. She'll need a hand getting down. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20001 | Irrena has been killed. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20007 | Irrena's made it off the Defiant. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20003 | Beodul wandered into a trap. He'll need my help getting out again. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20004 | Beodul has been killed. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20008 | I got Beodul out of his predicament. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20005 | I found Eld Engrim by a road leading east. He seems to be doing fine for himself. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20006 | Eld Engrim has been killed. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20009 | Vela has been killed. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20010 | Chitupec has survived the wreck of the Defiant in one piece. |- | style="vertical-align:text-top" | 20011 | Chitupec has been killed. |- ! colspan="3" | End states |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30000 | My old crew's dead and gone. Maneuvering the ship may be more difficult on my own, but at least my company is improved. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{cross}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30001 | I didn't have the time to waste on finding my old crew. I left them on the island. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30002 | I couldn't save all of my old crew, but at least I won't be managing the ship entirely on my own. |- | style="text-align:center" | {{check}} | style="vertical-align: text-top" | 30003 | We lost plenty of people in the wreck, but I managed to find a few of the old crew. |}
